messages.subject: Subject: Soapmaking via Vegetarian Means
messages.msgSnippet: Stacia Wrote: From: Scott and Stacia Young  Subject: Soapmaking via Vegetarian Means Aleasa - I am a devoted vegetarian also, who
messages.messageBody:
Stacia Wrote:
From: "Scott and Stacia Young" <msyoung@...>
Subject: Soapmaking via Vegetarian Means

Aleasa -

I am a devoted vegetarian also, who started making natural herbal soaps several years ago. I began by reading and using the recipes in The Soap Book by Sandy Maine. This was her first book on soapmaking but I believe she has several others now. All the rec
ipes in this book are vegetarian (meaning they don't use tallow or lard) and are scented using herbal essential oils (which is by far the most expensive ingredient).

Stacia:

Thank You! It's funny how a person can use different search engines and never come up with what their looking for. That's one reason I like this list! I think she will like several of the books offered here. Thanks again, we really appreciate the info...Aleasa
